Landlord: I'm open to discussing a longer lease term, but the security deposit would remain the standard amount due to company policy. Could we agree on a two-year lease in exchange for the reduced rent?

Max Müller: I'm happy to commit to a two-year lease in order to secure a more favorable rent price. So, I agree to the price with a 5% reduction and a two-year lease term.
